hexpsi.spellpiece.selector_sentinel_tier: Returns your sentinel's tier, with a nonexistent or inaccessible sentinel returning 0.
hexpsi.spellpiece.selector_helmet_vec.de: Attempts to read the vector stored in your helmet sensor.
hexpsi.spellpiece.selector_read_vec.desc: Attempts to read a vector from held iota storage.
hexpsi.spellpiece.selector_read_num.desc: Attempts to read a number from held iota storage.
hexpsi.spellpiece.selector_read_entity.d: Attempts to read an entity from held iota storage.
hexpsi.spellpiece.selector_read_entities: Attempts to read a list of entities from held iota storage.
hexpsi.spellpiece.trick_write_helmet_vec: Attempts to write a vector to your helmet sensor. Does not trigger the sensor.
hexpsi.spellpiece.trick_set_sentinel.des: Summons your sentinel at the target position.
hexpsi.spellpiece.trick_write_iota_vec.d: Attempts to write a vector to held iota storage.
hexpsi.spellpiece.trick_write_iota_num.d: Attempts to write a number to held iota storage.
hexpsi.spellpiece.trick_write_iota_entit: Attempts to write an entity to held iota storage.
Attempts to write a list of entities to held iota storage.
hexpsi.spellpiece.fx_suppressor.desc: Disables basic sounds/particles from a hex cast via Trinket Bullet.
hexpsi.spellpiece.media_suppressor.desc: Disables the media report after a hex cast via Trinket Bullet.
hexpsi.spellerror.truename: ERROR: Attempted to save reference to another player.
hexpsi.spellerror.enlightenment: ERROR: Am I not skilled enough?
hexpsi.spellerror.unreadablecontents: ERROR: Readable item does not contain readable data.
hexpsi.spellerror.badtier: ERROR: Sentinel tier must be an integer between [0,2].
hexpsi.badhelmet.readable: Helmet does not contain a readable iota.
this.is.a.comment.1: Lore-wise, I think the trinket parts of the bullet act kind of like a coprocessor that the CAD dispatches instructions to.
